text: the st bernard is soooo adorbs! 😍

answers.text: @grace_yoong yes... huge! Bruno is afraid of her... initially he was ok but when she dashed towards him, he kinda of retreated😂 Not first time. The owners usually bring her out after 9 pm when there are fewer furkids out for walks. All the smaller ones are terrified of her biggie size. Last week i was lucky to bump into her. Helper brought her out early with the pawmum supervising from upstairs😂. Yesterday we passed by their house n Kiara was lying down unleashed while the humans were playing badminton. One of the human siblings spotted Bruno n called out to him, Kiara immediately got up n wanted to dash out 🤣everyone yelled... “she is not on leash” n literally pushed her back into the house.  This evening we met a huge 2 month old...old english sheepdog.  He was all over Bruno who dragged me away... scare😂
